author: Slidebean
description:
The hidden risk of AI chatbots: they agree too much.

Out of nearly 200 official complaints about ChatGPT, only 7 were serious but they revealed a subtle danger.
Large language models are designed to be polite and supportive, yet that tone can unintentionally reinforce false or harmful beliefs.
Companies are now testing AI “psych evaluations,” step by step refusals, and human handoffs for sensitive cases.
In the future, safety in AI won’t just mean accuracy, it’ll mean emotional responsibility.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: ChatGPT isn’t driving people crazy but it might be making them believe lies

author: Slidebean
description:
We made AI superhuman but it still can’t act human.

AI can do math, code, and write essays but ask it where to find a therapist, and it fails.
We’ve built digital brains we don’t fully understand.
Smarter than us in theory, dumber in empathy.

👉Hear the full breakdown on The Slidebean Stand-Up; streaming now on Spotify, Apple Podcasts, and all major podcast platforms.
title: We’re building superhuman AI that keeps failing like a human
